name: Natural Spell
text: You can cast spells even while in a form that cannot normally cast spells.
benefit:
You can complete the verbal and somatic components of spells while using wild shape. You substitute various noises and gestures for the normal verbal and somatic components of a spell.

You can also use any material components or focuses you possess, even if such items are melded within your current form. This feat does not permit the use of magic items while you are in a form that could not ordinarily use them, and you do not gain the ability to speak while using wild shape.
mythicText: You can speak and use some magic items when you use wild shape.
mythicBenefit: When you’re using wild shape, you can use spell completion and spell trigger magic items that were on your person when you changed form. You don’t need to physically manipulate the items when you use them while using wild shape. Furthermore, you can speak normally when using wild shape.
text_zh: 你可在自然变身状态下施法，即使该形态正常无法施法。
prerequisites_zh: 感知13，【自然变身】职业特性。
benefit_zh: 你可在自然变身状态下完成法术的言语与姿势。你使用各种声音和动作代替原本法术正常的言语与姿势。你仍旧能够使用任何你拥有的施法材料或器材，即使这些东西已经融进了你现在的形态中。若此型态原本就无法使用某种魔法物品，这项专长并不赋予使用物品的能力，此外本专长也不能让你在自然变身型态时说话。
mythicText_zh: 当你使用自然变身时，能够进行交谈和使用魔法物品。
mythicBenefit_zh: 当你使用自然变身时，你能够使用法术完成型与法术触发型魔法物品，这些物品必须在你变更形态的时候已经携带在身上。当你在使用自然变身形态下使用这些物品时，不需要用身体对这些物品进行操作。除此之外，你还能够在使用自然变身时，正常进行交谈。
